room_title: Escape room "Wall Street Heist" by Red Button Escape Games in Bend
room_address: 1155 SW Division St, Suite A3, Bend, OR 97702
room_description: For several decades a con artist Bernie Madoff pulled off the most elaborate Ponzi scheme in history. His fraudulent investment operation in a Wall Street firm allowed him to rip off thousands of clients. In 2008, he was finally captured and sentenced to 150 years in prison. One of his accomplices was recently spotted in a secluded London flat. The police need your help to unravel the clues left behind.
